metadata.Description: Financial services, such as loans, savings, and insurance, provided to low-income individuals or small businesses.

level 1.Description: Micro-finance implements energy access programs that provide financial support for clean energy projects in underserved communities.
Micro-finance funds renewable energy startups that develop innovative solutions for sustainable energy generation.
Micro-finance focuses on addressing energy poverty by providing financial services for clean energy solutions to marginalized communities.
Micro-finance plays a role in sustainable energy investments by providing financial resources for renewable energy projects.
Micro-finance partners with local NGOs to support sustainable energy initiatives in marginalized communities.
Micro-finance contributes to improving energy access by providing financial services for clean energy solutions.
Micro-finance monitors the progress and impact of clean energy projects that it supports financially.
Micro-finance targets women entrepreneurs in the sustainable energy sector by providing financial support and resources.
Micro-finance addresses the energy access gap by providing financial services for clean energy solutions in underserved communities.

level 2.Subject: renewable energy certificates

level 2.Subject: energy markets
level 2.Description: Energy markets address the issue of energy access by ensuring the availability and affordability of energy sources for all segments of society.

level 2.Subject: energy markets
level 2.Description: Energy markets employ renewable energy technologies to diversify the energy mix and reduce dependence on fossil fuels.
